title: Balsamic Roasted Brussels Sprouts
directions: In a bowl, toss the Brussels sprouts with olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey (if using), salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Spread them out in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway through, until caramelized and crispy on the edges.
If using Parmesan or nuts, sprinkle them on in the last 5 minutes of roasting.
notes: Pairs perfectly with balsamic vinaigrette marinated chicken breast. Garnish ideas: fresh parsley or thyme, balsamic reduction drizzle, toasted walnuts/pecans/almonds, pomegranate seeds for color, crispy bacon bits, or lemon zest for brightness. Reserve some balsamic marinade before adding raw chicken to use as extra drizzle.
